author: trackreco
body:
### PR description:

This PR follows #35652 and updates mkFit in view of CMSSW_12_2_0.

In detail, this PR:
- updates the mkFit track seed partition function for the definition of parallel tasks;
- updates the mkFit track seed converter to account for matched hits in track seeds;
- (via cmsdist#7427 and cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit#7) updates mkFit release and configurations in order to improve the overall physics performance at track-building level for tracking iterations where mkFit is enabled (as in PR #35660).

It requires cms-sw/cmsdist#7427 and cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit#7.

### PR validation:

Details of performance after this PR have been presented at TRK POG meeting on November 1st: 
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1092090/#2-mkfit-status-report
title: Update mkFit for CMSSW_12_2_0
